checkUpkeep(bytes).details: Used by Chainlink Automation for upkeep checks

returns.upkeepNeeded: Whether the next step can be executed

params.amountIn: The amount of collateral to use for the first step
params.orderData: Encoded order data for the MatchboxRouter

executeNextStep(bytes).details: Called by trusted automation network (e.g., Chainlink Automation)

params.orderData: Encoded order data for the MatchboxRouter

params.rules: Array of rules defining the conditional sequence

params.amount: The amount to withdraw (0 = withdraw all)
params.token: The token to withdraw (collateral or conditional token)

OWNER().notice: The owner of this Matchbox (the user who deployed it)

ROUTER().notice: The MatchboxRouter contract that executes trades

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Checks if the next step is ready to execute

deactivate().notice: Emergency function to deactivate the sequence

executeFirstStep(uint256,bytes).notice: Executes the first step in the sequence

executeNextStep(bytes).notice: Executes the next step in the sequence

getRule(uint256).notice: Gets the rule for a specific step

sequence(uint256).notice: Array of rules defining the sequence

totalSteps().notice: Total number of steps in the sequence

withdrawFunds(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws funds from the Matchbox (owner only)
